full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI DAM RTA MGRIN CHOS SKYONG GSUM GYI GTOR MA SKYONG TSUL 'DOD DON MYUR 'GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES YI DAM RTA MGRIN CHOS SKYONG GSUM GYI GTOR MA SKYONG TSUL 'DOD DON MYUR 'GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD PA DANG LDAN PA RNAL 'BYOR PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I HOR TSA THO SU BRU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA DUS RGYUN DU YI DAM CHOS SKYONG LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BLA MA DAM PA'I GSUNG RGYUN LNGAR AA MO GHA BADZRA GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID DO, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR 'GYUR @004B CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
